channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins promoted builds Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins promoted builds Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21641|2024-10-15T17:14:47.328Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20promoted%20builds%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins promoted builds Plugin 3.9 and earlier allows attackers to to promote builds.
